== Who I am ==
''Only what we have for free, we have to do ourselves.''

This is my motto for contributing to Ubuntu.

My name is Artur and I study logistics. I'm from Tczew and my moniker is Ari - so these are components of my nickname.

== My Ubuntu story ==
I was MOTU already since September 2010 till April 2011. Now I came back and since 15th July do some work for Ubuntu.

== My involvement ==

=== Examples of my work / Things I'm proud of ===
* Reduction of difference between Debian and Ubuntu

Work done since July 2013: http://paste.ubuntu.com/6402818/ (status 12.11.2013)

=== Areas of work ===
* Merges
* Syncs
* Security Uploads

=== Things I could do better ===
* Debian packages management
* Minimalize Ubuntu's delta
* More help with translations

== Plans for the future ==

=== General ===
I want to invite contributors from my country and help them with start packaging. Besides this, I want to implement <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ArturRona/QuickResponse|Ubuntu Quick Response Strategy]]</nowiki> (my own).

=== What I like least in Ubuntu ===
I'm concerned of:
* unactive sponsors since joined MOTU
* too long response from sponsors for main and SRU due to many bugs subscribed

=== MartinPitt ===
==== General feedback ====

I have sponsored 6 packages for Arthur a while ago (karmic to natty), 5 of them being merges. There hasn't been any problem out of the ordinary (like fighting with broken UDD branches). I don't have much recent experience, only four sponsored syncs in saucy. I have no objection at all against reactivating his MOTU credentials, I just cannot give an explicit recommendation at this point due to lack of recent experience. Thanks Artur!

==== Specific Experiences of working together ====

* Recent saucy syncs: Bug:1203548, Bug:1203874, Bug:1203879, Bug:1203882
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/sane-backends/1.0.22-1ubuntu1|sane-backends natty merge]]</nowiki> (fairly complex)
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/gdm/2.28.1-0ubuntu2.2|gdm karmic SRU]]</nowiki> (simple)

-- <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:pitti]]</nowiki>
